contents.text: Welcome to Twitch, the live streaming video platform for gaming and entertainment in San Francisco.
If you’re a streamer needing assistance, press '1'.
For technical support with your stream or broadcasting software, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to Twitch streamer technical support.

navigationGoals: Fix my streaming software connection issue quickly
Fix OBS streaming issues with audio and video during my live broadcast.
My OBS encoder is dropping frames; I need help troubleshooting my live stream.
I’m a streamer and my broadcasting software isn’t working right – I need help getting it running.
I need help configuring my streaming software (OBS) to eliminate frame drops and sync issues.

contents.text: For questions about monetization, subscriptions, and partnerships, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships and monetization team.

navigationGoals: Check my partnership payout and subscription revenue details
Learn how to meet Twitch affiliate requirements and activate channel subscriptions.
I want to adjust my Affiliate subscription tiers and review my payout settings.
I want to set up subscriptions and start monetizing my channel but don’t know how to enroll.
I’d like to learn how to join Twitch’s partnership program and understand the revenue split from subscriptions.

contents.text: If you are a viewer and need assistance, press '2'.
For account, login, and password issues, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to account support.

navigationGoals: Reset my Twitch password and regain access
Reset my password to regain access to my locked Twitch account.
I’m locked out of my Twitch account due to 2FA errors; I need to reset my credentials.
I can’t access my Twitch account because I forgot my password and need to reset it.
I need to reset my Twitch account password and regain access after multiple failed login attempts.

contents.text: To report content, file a safety concern, or for moderation help, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to content moderation and safety support.

navigationGoals: Report abusive content in chat to moderation
Report abusive behavior in chat and request content moderation assistance.
I’d like to report a channel for harassment and check on my safety report status.
I need to report a stream with inappropriate content and get help filing a safety concern.
I want to report inappropriate content I saw on a channel and file a safety concern with moderation.
